title: Logitech m325c Mouse | Up Close Views | Wireless Optical
description:
Amazon Link - http://amzn.to/2weFDF4

Logitech - M325c Wireless Optical Mouse 


Logitech Advanced Optical Tracking technology Improved LED light positioning makes this optical mouse more responsive and accurate. Wireless connection This mouse connects to your computer using a wireless USB receiver. Standard 3-button mouse design Features a scroll wheel and 3 buttons.
